definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: We didn't come to an agreement because of their demands that were less than reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 由於他們的要求不近情理，我們沒能達成協議。

sentences.english: The expectations of 'De Bestest Fans in de Werld Ever, Like' have become unreasonably high.
sentences.chinese: “最忠誠的球迷”對他們的期待高得不合情理。

sentences.english: A Sino-American trade spat is all too plausible.
sentences.chinese: 一場中美貿易爭戰的爆發也實在是很合乎情理。

sentences.english: To be realistic a past accident makes more sense.
sentences.chinese: 說實話，說是過去的一次事故更合乎情理。

sentences.english: The copulation in mule market has become the common thing.
sentences.chinese: 騾馬市上的交配也就成了情理之事。

sentences.english: Introducing time-based functionality seems to be the logical next step.
sentences.chinese: 下一步引入基於時間的功能似乎是合乎情理的。
墮胎從道德上講合乎情理嗎？

sentences.english: Alfred and Kala were betrothed, which was a very natural result;
sentences.chinese: 阿爾弗里茲和卡拉訂婚了，這是極合乎情理的。

sentences.english: The grass grows and the horse is ruttish, how reasonable the natural is in turn.
sentences.chinese: 草長馬發情，這種自然界的交替是多麼合乎情理。

sentences.english: This method of analysing concepts should seem fairly commonsensical.
sentences.chinese: 分析概念的這個方法，看來似乎是相當合乎情理的。

sentences.english: On the other hand, some of the grievances are legitimate.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，他們有些牢騷也在情理之中。

sentences.english: It lies near to suppose that she was there.
sentences.chinese: 設想她曾在場，這是很近情理的。

sentences.english: This a few words, I can not deny, either to just match reason.
sentences.chinese: 這幾句話，我也不能不承認恰合情理。

sentences.english: But from a legal perspective, it makes sense.
sentences.chinese: 但從法律的角度看，這是合乎情理的。

sentences.english: This is essentially what "reasonable forcing functions" are all about.
sentences.chinese: 這本質上來說正是合乎情理的強制手段的真正含義。

definition: common sense/the way people usually feel about things
Heaven's law/the natural order of things
irreproachable (idiom)/nothing blameworthy about it at all
human nature (idiom)/a behavior that is only natural
